trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_SEQ_00<tab>You cannot help but feel something is bothering Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_TODO_01<tab>Wait at the entrance to Slitherbough.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the manager of suites in the Pendants.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_THANCRED_000_000<tab>What <var 1A 02 /var>Master Matoya<var 1A 01 /var> did was completely and utterly reckless... But if not for her, a great many of the Night's Blessed would not be here.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_RYNE_000_005<tab>Considering the Blessed have only just recovered from their encounter with the Eulmorans, Thancred and the others thought we should stay a while longer to be sure they're all right.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_RYNE_000_006<tab>They're such a kind and caring people. I pray they never again have to face such hardship.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_URIANGER_000_010<tab>It seems the Blessed were spared the worst of the Eulmorans' assault, for the better part of Ran'jit's forces abandoned Slitherbough in our pursuit.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_URIANGER_000_011<tab>Had he been but a few steps faster, he may well hath foiled our efforts to slay the Lightwarden.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>Though it pains me to leave, it is time I returned with you and the others to the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>But before we go, might I speak with you in private? I will await you in my chambers.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>Thank you for coming. I thought to keep my suspicions to myself, but after witnessing your victory at Rak'tika Falls, I fear they prove true, and so I must share them with you.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>From the first when we met at Fort Gohn, your aether has appeared...tainted. Suffused with an overabundance of light not unlike the sin eaters.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>When you defeated the Lightwarden, I fear the light which poured forth from it was not negated by Hydaelyn's blessing. Rather, it was absorbed into your being.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>Urianger also suspects as much, though he is unwilling to share his thoughts on the matter.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_034<tab>One thing is certain: with every Warden you defeat, the danger to you grows greater. Greater perhaps than we can imagine. If you begin to feel anything strange─anything at all─pray inform me at once.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>You should hurry, before the others begin to worry. Once I have sorted my things here I will join you.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>Pray go on ahead. I would first attend to this unsightly collection of books.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab><sigh> I'd always complained that her cave was such a mess, books and scrolls strewn about like a child's playthings. Gods, I really <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> turning into her...
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_THANCRED_000_050<tab>We took one last patrol of the perimeter. All things considered, Slitherbough remains relatively unscathed.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_RYNE_000_051<tab>Thanks to the antidote, all those who were poisoned will make a full recovery.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_RYNE_000_052<tab>And with the night sky returned, their prayers have at last been answered.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_053<tab>Sorry to keep you all waiting. Shall we be off, then?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_URIANGER_000_054<tab>Art thou certain this is best?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_055<tab>...I'll not deny there is a part of me that wishes I could stay.

TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_056<tab>For two years I have lived with the Blessed, learned their culture, even going so far as to adopt Master Matoya's name as my own. I but pray I did honor to it.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_057<tab>Now is not the time for doubt or hesitation. Come, we must return to the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_THANCRED_000_060<tab>Hopefully the others will arrive before long.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_RYNE_000_065<tab>I know he said he would be watching from the shadows, but doesn't it seem wrong to leave without at least telling Emet-Selch?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_URIANGER_000_070<tab>'Twas passing strange to see the Crystarium so seemingly desolate, yet it appears all is well.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab>All things considered, it is hardly surprising that Alphinaud and Alisaie have yet to arrive, but where is the Exarch?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>My friends! 'Tis good to see you all again.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_082<tab>Alphinaud! It has been too long.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>I assume your presence here means you've brought word of the Warden hiding in Rak'tika?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_ALPHINAUD_000_084<tab>Found and slain, you say? I should have known.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_MYSTERYVOICE_000_085<tab>Eulmore has but recently dispatched soldiers to all corners of Norvrandt to defend them. I am glad to see their efforts were wasted on the Greatwood.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_THANCRED_000_086<tab>Speaking of Eulmore, what came of your meeting with Vauthry?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_MYSTERYVOICE_000_087<tab>Yes, about that. It proved to be...
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_MYSTERYVOICE_000_088<tab>...Urgh.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>Exarch, you mustn't push yourself. Your time away from the tower has clearly taken its toll.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>No doubt you all are tired as well, having traveled so far. Why don't we all take a much-needed rest before we discuss our findings?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>I thought to propose the very same. After your clash with the Warden, you deserve a chance to recuperate.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_THANCRED_000_092<tab>It's settled, then. We reconvene after everyone has had time to settle in.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_100<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Returned from a lengthy excursion, I take it.
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_101<tab>Well, your room has been made ready, if you'd care to retire?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_Q1_000_000<tab>Retire to your quarters?
TEXT_LUCKMC121_03342_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_102<tab>Very good. I pray you sound sleep and pleasant dreams.
